title: BackHug
description:
Imagine life free from back aches and pains...

It’s possible with BackHug.

BackHug is a back-care device that soothes your back aches and pains, giving new energy to your day!

BackHug’s human-sized robotic fingers will apply focused pressure to the centre of your back and your shoulder blades.

It adapts to your individual back shape and creates 2000+ treatment possibilities via our in-App back health consultation.

Further instructions on using BackHug can be found via our website!

http://mybackhug.com/ 

Get started in 6 easy steps!

Register your BackHug device

Configure WiFi on your BackHug

Complete our 1:1 consultation to create a personalised program suited to your needs.

Lie down on your device and start your session

The strength of the fingers treating the neck, shoulder blades, mid back and lower back can be adjusted individually. Both the program and the strength of the fingers can be adjusted at any time

After your session finishes, you’ll be feeling refreshed and relaxed, with the tension and aches/pains in your back and neck much improved!

Let us know what you think by rating us on Google!

Find us on Instagram at https://www.instagram.com/mybackhug/ 

Like us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/mybackhug/ 

#GotYourBack

==================================================
